Test Name: Platelet Storage Pool Deficiency Gene Panel, Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with platelet storage pool deficiency (PSPD) for diagnostic, prognostic, and therapeutic purposes using next-generation sequencing.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit (e.g., Qiagen DNA Blood Mini Kit); Fluorometer (e.g., Qubit); Spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop); Target enrichment kit (e.g., Agilent SureSelect); Magnetic bead purification system (e.g., AMPure XP); NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina MiSeq/HiSeq); qPCR or bioanalyzer
